item.title: SOLID Principle Examples
item.description: Throughout my career I’ve applied and tested solutions against SOLID principles.

item.title: Go Public Service Announcement
item.description: Proxy support for some Go applications is being unintentionally dropped with a simple change.

item.title: HTTP Connect By Example
item.description: HTTP CONNECT is used to establish a tunnel. Tunnels are commonly used to create an end-to-end virtual connection, through one or more proxies, which can then be secured using TLS (Transport Layer Security).
